title: Shiny Ecommerce App
text: project interactive Shiny app allows users explore sales customer trends UK-based eCommerce store. provides insights key business metrics leveraging data visualization filtering capabilities. app portfolio project showcasing data analytics, dashboard development, R programming skills. enables users analyze sales trends, customer behavior, product performance dynamically. Additionally, app developed following software engineering best practices, organizing code R packge structure. simplifies development standardising code structure providing tooling around dependency management, testing documentation ensuring maintainability, scalability, ease use. Access live demo : Live Demo

title: Shiny Ecommerce App
text: Interactive Data Filtering: Filter sales data date range, product category, customer segment, . Trend Analysis: Visualize sales performance time identify seasonal trends. Customer Insights: Explore repeat customers, order frequency, segmentation. Product Performance Tracking: Identify best-selling underperforming products. Dynamic Visualizations: Use ggplot2, plotly, shiny generate interactive charts.

title: Shiny Ecommerce App
text: Shiny (R) – Web application framework ggplot2, plotly – Data visualization data.table – Data manipulation bslib – UI framework testthat, roxygen2 – Testing documentation

title: Shiny Ecommerce App
text: run Shiny app locally, follow steps: Clone repository: Install dependencies (already installed): Run app:
code: git clone https://github.com/abelinglars/ecomdash.git cd ecomdash renv::restore() start_app()

title: Shiny Ecommerce App
text: dataset contains historical transaction data UK-based online retailer. invoice_no: Unique transaction ID stock_code: Product identifier description: Product name quantity: Number units sold date: Date transaction unit_price: Price per unit customer_id: Unique customer identifier country: Customer’s country Data cleaned preprocessed improve usability.

title: Shiny Ecommerce App
text: dashboard helps: - Identify top-selling products seasonal trends. - Understand customer purchasing patterns. - Detect potential market opportunities analyzing country-wise sales.
